name: Medium Dior Vibe Hobo Bag
description: New this season, Maria Grazia Chiuri imagines the Dior Vibe bag with the allure of a Hobo bag showcasing modern lines. The black Cannage lambskin style features a suede interior while a white 'CHRISTIAN DIOR PARIS' signature adorns the bottom of the bag. Featuring a handle in addition to a removable and adjustable shoulder strap with a military-inspired buckle, the medium Dior Vibe bag can be carried by hand, worn on the shoulder or crossbody for a sportier look.
